description:
Pretty much a 95% downclimb canyon, not worth it.

Approach

The start is steep, at the bridge it is possible to walk down along the wall. From there on you have boulders everywhere but no water yet.

Descent

There are 2 small rappels and a 40m Waterfall. Not much considering the total height difference is about 400m.

Exit

At the end of the canyon, on the right side of the river is a ramp which goes back to the road.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Aboyeu
